<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/{realm}/orgs/{orgId}/roles/{name}/users/{userId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Grant the specified user to the specified organization role

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"path","name":"realm","description":"realm name (not id!)","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"orgId","description":"organization id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"name","description":"organization role name","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"},{"in":"path","name":"userId","description":"user id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"style":"simple"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
